questions.name: virat kholi
questions.question: aap crickrt kyu chuna hai
questions.answer:
virat kholi  के बारे में:
Virat Kohli (born 5 November 1988) is an Indian international cricketer who plays Test and ODI cricket for the national team and is a former captain in all formats. He is a right-handed batsman and an occasional right arm medium pace bowler. Widely regarded as one of the greatest batsmen in the history of the sport, and  nickamed the King, the Chase Master, and the Run Machine for his playing style, records and ability to lead his team to victory,  Kohli is the highest run-scorer in the Indian Premier League, third in T20I, third in ODI, and third in international cricket.

सवाल: aap crickrt kyu chuna hai 
जवाब: Virat Kohli (born 5 November 1988) is an Indian international cricketer who plays Test and ODI cricket for the national team and is a former captain in all formats
